instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00609: What is 820-00609? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: iMac 2017 27" <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00609</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> BIOS Chip replacement
threads.message:
As I was getting prepared to replace the BIOS chip I noticed a SMD near the BIOS chip that looks different.  I do not have schematics or boardview.  If anyone has info on the component I drew a line to could you describe it or marking ID but also the see the component is bad or not.  
Thank you.

threads.title: iMac 2017 27" <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00609</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> BIOS Chip replacement
